Bearer.description: Provide a valid bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {app_token}'

post.description: Create a new account under your directory. Most account details are cloned from an existing template to allow quick setup

admin_country_name.description: Admin country name. This is REQUIRED if the admin_phone parameter is sent

country_name.description: Business country. This is REQUIRED if the phone parameter is sent

template_business_id.description: ID of the template to create the account from

business_name.description: Account business/company name. e.g. 'The Tax Advisors'

package_name.description: For more details and available options please contact your account manager

setup.description: Suspend the account "to do" list (onboarding) If you want to edit the account settings before handing it to the account owner, send 'in_setup' to suspend the account "to do" list.  Send 'completed' if you do not want to suspend the account "to do" list

external_subscription_params.description: Billing params. Can send multiple parameter with a different key/value

external_id.description: You can use your own external ID to manage accounts

time_zone.description: Account time zone. e.g. Central Time (US & Canada)

member_tags.description: Tags per account. Will be displayed in the Partner Dashboard. Separate with a comma

422.description: 422 - Unprocessable Entity. Bad parameter(s), see content for more information.

Result.value: Bad parameter(s), see content for more information.

parameters.name: edit_tags
parameters.description: Tags per account. Will be displayed in the Partner Dashboard. Separate with a comma

parameters.name: add_sms_credits
parameters.description: The Number Of SMS Credit For Add To Account

parameters.name: delete_sms_credits
parameters.description: The Number Of SMS For Deletion From The Account

422.description: 422 - Unprocessable Entity. Bad parameter(s), see content for more information.

Result.value: Bad parameter(s), see content for more information.

business_id.description: A unique identifier of the business. Can be the our business_uid or external_id

notifications.description: A list of notifications to send after processing of the lead. Possible values: "auto-reply" (thank you email to the end user), "email" (notify the business owner) or "sms" (text notification to the business owner). None if empty

identifier_type.description: Defines which unique identifier will be used to search for an existing lead or create a new one. Possible values: "email" or "unique_id"

email.description: Lead email address. Unique per lead

unique_id.description: Lead unique id. Unique per business

first_name.description: Lead first name. Mandatory for a new lead

opt_in.description: Send "true" if lead opted in for promotions. Make sure the "opt-in" client card field is added to the client card under Settings>Client card

request_title.description: Request title. Will also be the created conversation title

request_data.description: The information that the end user has provided. (e.g the labels and values of a contact form/client card).  Replace {field_name} with the field name/label. Repeat this parameter for every field. Value can be a string, if a date field value is given a string with the format YYYY-MM-DD is expected. Please note: this information is visible both to the business owner and to the end user. Therefore it should not contain private business information.

system_message.description: A message displayed to the business owner to introduce the lead. May contain links

source.description: Will be displayed to the business owner as the lead source

source_url.description: The URL of the page where the lead was created
